section.name: Interactive Documentation
section.p:
The following content serves as an interactive guide to the
OpenSIMS,
an
Open Source Security Infrastructure Management System.
The system provides means for tying together the open source tools used for security management into a common infrastructure.
It leads toward the development of new SIMS technologies which allow different networks using risk metrics to collaborate on attacker profiling and remediation.

Perhaps one of the best ways to learn about how OpenSIMS works, is to view our
screenshots
tour and
animation
movie.
Another good approach is to look over our
architecture.
